com.pkware.smartcrypt.keymanagement

Interface Smartkeys


  • public interface Smartkeys

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Observable<Smartkey> create(SmartkeySpec spec) 
      Observable<Smartkey> deserialize(String serialized) 
      Observable<Set<Smartkey>> listAll() 
      void requestAccess(String serialized) 
      String serialize(Smartkey smartkey) 
      Observable<Smartkey> update(Smartkey smartkey, SmartkeySpec spec)
      It is not possible to change whether or not a key is rotatable or its kind.

    • Method Detail

      • listAll

        @Nonnull
Observable<Set<Smartkey>> listAll()

      • deserialize

        @Nonnull
Observable<Smartkey> deserialize(String serialized)
                                   throws MetaClientException,
                                          IllegalArgumentException
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the serialized content cannot be parsed
        MetaClientException - For various reasons, including network errors. It may be worth retrying.

      • serialize

        @Nonnull
String serialize(Smartkey smartkey)
                   throws MetaClientException
        Returns:
        The serialized Smartkey. This is safe to store in plaintext and with the data.
        Throws:
        MetaClientException - If the provided key cannot be serialized. This may happen if given an invalid key.

      • requestAccess

        void requestAccess(String serialized)
            throws MetaClientException
        Throws:
        MetaClientException - With MetaClientException.category of MetaClientException.CATEGORY_UPGRADE if the serialized content cannot be parsed. May also happen as a results of network problems and other reasons.

      • create

        @Nonnull
Observable<Smartkey> create(SmartkeySpec spec)
                              throws MetaClientException
        Throws:
        MetaClientException - If the Smartkey cannot be created

      • update

        @Nonnull
Observable<Smartkey> update(Smartkey smartkey,
                                     SmartkeySpec spec)
                              throws MetaClientException
        It is not possible to change whether or not a key is rotatable or its kind.
        Throws:
        MetaClientException
